mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tree (geographical_point, species_id, tree_height, number_tree_trunks, trunk_girth, diameter_crown, height_first_branch, condition_assessment, age, tree_planting_type, author_id, status) VALUES (#{tree.geographicalPoint}, #{tree.species.id}, #{tree.treeHeight}, #{tree.numberTreeTrunks}, #{tree.trunkGirth}, #{tree.diameterCrown}, #{tree.heightFirstBranch}, #{tree.conditionAssessment}, #{tree.age}, #{tree.treePlantingType}, #{tree.authorId}, #{tree.status})
mapper.update: UPDATE tree SET geographical_point = #{tree.geographicalPoint}, species_id = #{tree.species.id}, tree_height = #{tree.treeHeight}, number_tree_trunks = #{tree.numberTreeTrunks}, trunk_girth = #{tree.trunkGirth}, diameter_crown = #{tree.diameterCrown}, height_first_branch = #{tree.heightFirstBranch}, condition_assessment = #{tree.conditionAssessment}, age = #{tree.age}, tree_planting_type = #{tree.treePlantingType}, updated = now(), status = #{tree.status} WHERE id = #{tree.id}
mapper.select: SELECT tree.id AS id, geographical_point AS geographical_point, species_tree.id AS species_id, species_tree.title AS species_title, tree_height AS tree_height, number_tree_trunks AS number_tree_trunks, trunk_girth AS trunk_girth, diameter_crown AS diameter_crown, height_first_branch AS height_first_branch, condition_assessment AS condition_assessment, age AS age, tree_planting_type AS tree_planting_type, created AS created, updated AS updated, author_id AS author_id, status AS status FROM tree LEFT JOIN species_tree ON species_id = species_tree.id WHERE tree.id = #{id}
